ygData.subject: Level 9 huh?
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay I have a level 26 druid and I did a lot of soloing in Butcher Block until i was 10 or 11 (can t remember) then I went to N. Ro and soloed Scarabs. (dk
ygData.messageBody:
Okay I have a level 26 druid and I did a lot of
soloing in Butcher Block until i was 10 or 11 (can't
remember) then I went to N. Ro and soloed Scarabs. (dk
Blue) till 12. (just don't go for trantalas cause
poison is dangerous even as a druid.) Then I grouped for
the first time in a derv group in N. Ro. I leveled to
13 and then went to group at orc highway in Oasis.
You can probably go to oasis at 12 cause groups like
a druid who can damage shield the tanks, and you
have an okay heal spell.<br> You can stay in oasis
till like 20 and still group good. Groups are great
for druids. You can practice on the support role you
play. (and trust me ya you can solo, but grouping is
usually more fun and rewarding.)<br><br> After 20 make
your way to lake of ill omen, just passed Firiona Vie
(i know i spelled it wrong) and you can group there
for a long time)<br><br><br>Lastly I guess I just
want to say that if you are just a tad bit careful in
Butcher Block, you can solo there without worries of
death. Just don't go to chessboard and stay close to the
crossroads guard shed. I have run to them on many ocasion.
hehe
